channel.title: Status-Update on realjame
channel.description: Recent content in Status-Update on realjame

item.title: September Status
item.description: Day 3 of September. Things are going OK for me, I just wanted to write down here what I’m aiming for this month. Right now, I’m focusing on college applications and web development projects, so Roblox stuff will keep taking a back seat. I wrote on my Projects page that the new Project Micrathena will resume development this month. I hope I will find time to work on it, but it will likely be at the end of September, and not the start as hoped.

item.title: Update III - A Complete Redesign
item.description: Hello, this time I don’t want to write about myself too much. Just the website. I’ve spent almost 2 weeks now working on this big redesign, I really hope you like it! There’s a sidebar instead of the old header. I think it’s a more effective use of desktop screen space, and on mobile, it turns into a horizontally scrolling top bar! I was inspired by Zenith’s website in terms of design.
